contents:
This man is as good as my friends at Fox News. He can apply for contributor at Fox News or becoming one the friends in Fox & Friends, or being a better judge than Jeanine on Judge Shopping, or anything on 7p/10p weekdays. He can do it anytime he wants, but remember - in Fox News, we speek the Hamberder's Covfefe, which means NO MANDALORIAN OF XINESE! You can share your hate on illegal immigrants, liberals, Inner Citites, racial issues or whatever you want, but ONLY IN TRUMPISH!
